1452767125014073349.text:
Looking at my GH contributions, I see a marked difference in commits vs reviews. At first, it felt SO strange to see a higher percentage under community PR reviews than created PRs (w/ new Docs). 

But I soon realized that helping as Editor and Community Builder rocks. 🥳

/3 https://t.co/ipYCxkzAjf

1452767119859335169.text:
TBH, I thought he was exaggerating just a teensy bit. 😂 But once I joined... what he predicted was exactly what's happened so far! 💥🤯 

I had no idea working for the #OSS #community would be SO different or that my priorities would be a 180° change from Product world.

/2

1452767118332600322.text:
When I first joined @getpostman to work on @AsyncAPISpec, @derberq warned me that a lot of my time would primarily revolve around responding to community questions, PRs, issues, etc. He even said that actual 'Doc Writing' would sometimes be the last thing I get to in the day!

/1

1451949763776040961.text: I love that I got hired as a Docs Writer, but I’ve also been doing workshops, talks, streams, and Community Building. 🤭🤯🤩

1450827099590127623.text:
I need gear with…
- counter balance handle: I trip easily & have balance issues
- guiding handle: Canela guides me outside of env that give me panic attacks
- hands free leash: makes solo travel easier
- traffic lead: staying as close as possible to Canela helps anxiety

/6

1450827097732108304.text:
Her team also educates on how to design gear that doesn’t hurt your #servicedog.

EX: Did you know that misusing a guiding handle could injure your dog’s spine & shoulders? 

It’s important disabled customers ALSO receive training on how to correctly use working dog’s gear. 

/5

1450827095966318593.text:
The other bonus is that her team helped me better understand my OWN #disability because of the many intelligent and educational questions they ask me during this process.

Each disability needs unique gear! Not all needs are the same 🙅🏻‍♀️

/4

1450827093973995523.text:
A main component to designing disability specific #servicedog gear is to have several sessions with the owner of this business. We can text, call, FaceTime or Zoom, it’s all up to me! The owner wants disabled customers to work closely with her team for each gear order 💜.

/3

1450531114334912514.text:
Literally spent part of my 1:1 today discussing what sort of Development Goals Canela should bring to the team.

I love my new team 😂🥳🥳🥳
